testimonial1.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonial1.content: TikGrow helped me grow from 1K to 50K followers in just 3 months! The engagement is completely organic and real.

testimonial2.name: Mike Chen
testimonial2.content: Finally, a platform that actually works! No bots, no fake accounts. Just real people engaging with real content.

testimonial3.name: Emma Rodriguez
testimonial3.content: The credit system is brilliant! I love discovering new creators while earning credits to boost my own videos.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about TikGrow

safe.question: Is TikGrow safe to use?
safe.answer: Yes! We never ask for your password or access your account. We only need your TikTok username for verification. All interactions are from real users.

howCredits.question: How do credits work?
howCredits.answer: You earn credits by engaging with other creators' content. Then use those credits to get engagement on your own videos. It's a fair exchange system.

realUsers.question: Are the interactions from real users?
realUsers.answer: Absolutely! All interactions come from real TikTok users who are part of our community. No bots, no fake accounts.

results.question: How quickly will I see results?
results.answer: Most campaigns start receiving interactions within minutes. You'll see real engagement from our active community right away.

pricing.question: How much does it cost?
pricing.answer: TikGrow is free to use! You earn credits by engaging with others and spend them on your own campaigns. No hidden fees or subscriptions.
